org.apache.flex.compiler.mxml

Interface IMXMLData

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    MXMLData

    public interface IMXMLData
    Represents the syntax, but not the semantics, of an MXML file.

    The file is represented as a sequence of "units", one for each open tag, close tag, and block of text.

    No meaning is assigned to any tag, attribute, or text.

    • Method Summary

      Methods

    • Method Detail

      • getFileSpecification

        IFileSpecification getFileSpecification()
        Gets the file on disk that created this MXMLData.
        Returns:
        The file as an IFileSpecification.

      • getPath

        String getPath()
        Gets the path to the file on disk that created this MXMLData.
        Returns:
        The path as a String.

      • getMXMLDialect

        MXMLDialect getMXMLDialect()
        Gets the MXML dialect being used.
        Returns:
        An MXMLDialect.

      • getUnits

        IMXMLUnitData[] getUnits()
        Get the MXML units found in this IMXMLData.
        Returns:
        An array of the IMXMLUnitData.

      • getNumUnits

        int getNumUnits()
        Gets the number of MXML "units".

        Each unit represents an open tag, a close tag, a block of text, etc.

        Returns:
        The number of MXMLUnitData objects you can retrieve with getUnit().

      • getUnit

        IMXMLUnitData getUnit(int i)
        Gets an MXML unit by index.
        Parameters:
        i - The index into the list of MXML units.
        Returns:
        The specified MXML unit, or null if the index is out of range.

      • getProblems

        Collection<ICompilerProblem> getProblems()
        Gets the compiler problems found during the creation of this MXMLData.
        Returns:
        A collection of ICompilerProblem objects.

      • getEnd

        int getEnd()
        Gets the ending offset of the last unit.

      • getRootTag

        IMXMLTagData getRootTag()
        Gets the root tag.
        Returns:
        An MXMLTagData for the root tag.

      • findTagOrSurroundingTagContainingOffset

        IMXMLTagData findTagOrSurroundingTagContainingOffset(int offset)
        Similar to findTagContainingOffset, but if the unit inside offset is a text node, will return the surrounding tag instead.
        Parameters:
        offset - offset
        Returns:
        the containing/surrounding tag, or null if one can not be found

      • getPrefixMapForData

        PrefixMap getPrefixMapForData(IMXMLTagData data)
        Returns the PrefixMap for the given IMXMLTagData. This will not walk up the chain of prefix maps if this tag does not physically have uri->namespace mappings.
        Parameters:
        data - the IMXMLTagData to find the PrefixMap for
        Returns:
        a PrefixMap or null
